dotnetType.name: FixedDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new fixed-length bytes deserializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" />; an unsuccessful
            result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a fixed-length bytes deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.

Generates a conversion from the source type to the intermediate type. This override
            will convert a bytes value to <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> prior to applying the base
            implementation.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FixedDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
